thread.title: Whisper app reveals what flight attendants really think of passengers
thread.title_full: Whisper app reveals what flight attendants really think of passengers

title: Whisper app reveals what flight attendants really think of passengers
text:
Whisper app reveals what flight attendants really think of passengers 
Postmedia Network Wednesday, October 21, 2015 01:47 PM EDT (Whisper Screenshot) Airports, Airlines & Security 
What do flight attendants really think of airline passengers? 
A new app called Whisper is pulling back the curtain on the secret thoughts of flight attendants and letting them vent their complaints anonymously. 
Related Content 
Anyone can upload their uncensored thoughts to the app, but, from fending off the unwanted advances of passengers to their own fears of flying, the flight attendants' confessions are an eye-opener. 
See some of the top flight attendant Whisper submissions below.
